text:
To display your moths for everyone to see them, you will either pin them or glue them.

If you have very small moths, you will be better off gluing them. Larger moths are easier to pin.

To pin your moths, watch this Moth Pinning video .

If you are going to glue your moths, watch the Moth Gluing video.

Once your students have sorted and pinned their moths, they may want to document each one by taking photos and creating individual data cards for further analysis.

You may want to introduce data cards with a hands-on activity. Access 10 printable data card pages of different moths to print and distribute for exploring and sorting. Go here for the alternate set of smaller cards on fewer pages.
